dependence_flag_logic.criteria: Trigger if any 2 or more of the above flags are present
dependence_flag_logic.message_template: {greeting} {name}, we see you’re navigating challenges like {key_issues}. {recommendation} would offer the support and safety you need. {preference_clause}

social_isolation_warning.message_template: {greeting} {name}, feeling lonely or down can weigh on you. {recommendation} could bring more connection and warmth to your days. {preference_clause}

cognitive_decline_warning.criteria: Show if moderate_cognitive_decline or severe_cognitive_risk is present
cognitive_decline_warning.message_template: {greeting} {name}, those memory challenges are something to watch. {recommendation} can provide the right support to keep you safe. {preference_clause}

final_decision_thresholds.in_home_with_support: Recommend if in_home score >= 3 and assisted_living score < 6
final_decision_thresholds.no_care_needed: Recommend if in_home score < 3 and assisted_living score < 3 and no dependence flags

memory_care_override.criteria: Always trigger if severe_cognitive_risk and no_support are present
memory_care_override.message_template: {greeting} {name}, with significant memory challenges and no one around daily, memory care is the safest way to ensure you’re well supported. {preference_clause}

assisted_living.message_template: {greeting} {name}, based on needs like {key_issues}, assisted living could provide the care and comfort you deserve. {preference_clause}

moderate_needs_assisted_living_recommend.criteria: Use when assisted_living_score >= 6 AND in_home_score >= 3 AND moderate_dependence, moderate_mobility, and moderate_cognitive_decline are all present
moderate_needs_assisted_living_recommend.message_template: {greeting} {name}, your needs around {key_issues} point to assisted living for extra help, but with strong support, staying home might still work. {preference_clause}

close_to_assisted_living_with_moderate_n.criteria: Use when assisted_living_score >= 5, in_home_score >= 3, and both moderate_dependence and moderate_cognitive_decline are present
close_to_assisted_living_with_moderate_n.message_template: {greeting} {name}, you’re managing at home, but {key_issues} suggest more support may be needed soon. In-home care works for now, but let’s plan ahead. {preference_clause}

balanced_recommendation.message_template: {greeting} {name}, with {key_issues}, in-home care with some help fits well, especially since you {home_preference}. Assisted living’s an option if needs grow. {preference_clause}
balanced_recommendation.criteria: Use when assisted_living_score >= 6 AND in_home_score >= 3 AND none of the following are present: high_dependence, high_mobility_dependence, no_support, high_safety_concern, severe_cognitive_risk

in_home_with_mobility_challenges.criteria: Use when assisted_living_score >= 5 and in_home_score >= 3, and high_mobility_dependence is present, but no cognitive decline flags
in_home_with_mobility_challenges.message_template: {greeting} {name}, your mobility needs ({key_issues}) make in-home care with aids a good fit, but assisted living could make daily life easier. {preference_clause}

in_home_possible_with_cognitive_and_safe.criteria: Use when in_home_score >= 3 and assisted_living_score >= 3 and flags include moderate_cognitive_decline or severe_cognitive_risk or safety concerns
in_home_possible_with_cognitive_and_safe.message_template: {greeting} {name}, you’re holding strong, but {key_issues} like memory or safety mean in-home care with extra support is key. Let’s ensure you’re safe. {preference_clause}

in_home_with_support_and_financial_needs.criteria: Use when in_home score >= 3, assisted_living score < 6, and needs_financial_assistance flag is present
in_home_with_support_and_financial_needs.message_template: {greeting} {name}, in-home care suits your needs like {key_issues}, but with cost concerns, let’s find affordable ways to keep you comfortable. {preference_clause}

in_home_low_support_financial_needs.criteria: Use when needs_financial_assistance and limited_support are present, and no safety, cognitive, or mobility decline flags
in_home_low_support_financial_needs.message_template: {greeting} {name}, you’re doing great with minimal needs, but cost concerns and limited support ({key_issues}) suggest in-home care with smart solutions. {preference_clause}

independent_with_safety_concern.criteria: Use when individual is fully independent and triggers moderate_safety_concern or high_safety_concern but does not meet other risk thresholds
independent_with_safety_concern.message_template: {greeting} {name}, you’re thriving on your own, but safety concerns like {key_issues} suggest some home tweaks to keep you confident. {preference_clause}

independent_no_support_risk.criteria: Use when individual is independent and safe but has no regular caregiver support (no_support), and no cognitive, safety, or mobility decline
independent_no_support_risk.message_template: {greeting} {name}, you’re managing beautifully, but with no regular support ({key_issues}), some in-home check-ins could help. {preference_clause}

no_care_needed.criteria: Use when no flags are triggered and all scores are 0
no_care_needed.message_template: {greeting} {name}, you’re {positive_state} with no support needs right now! {encouragement}, and we’re here if things change. {preference_clause}

in_home_with_support.message_template: {greeting} {name}, in-home care with help for {key_issues} keeps you comfortable at home, especially since you {home_preference}. {preference_clause}

in_home_with_uncertain_support.criteria: Use when no other recommendation is triggered but any of the following flags are present: limited_support, moderate_risk, high_risk, mental_health_concern, moderate_dependence, moderate_mobility, moderate_safety_concern, low_access, very_low_access
in_home_with_uncertain_support.message_template: {greeting} {name}, in-home care could work with help for {key_issues}, but if support’s spotty, assisted living might be safer. {preference_clause}
